name: Wizard
summary: Destiny: A scholar of the arcane.
description: A scholar of the arcane, wizards uses magic to wreak havoc on their enemies, and to provide utility for their allies.

playstyles.title: In combat
playstyles.description: wizards rely on a limited number of powerful or situational spells. They must determine the right moment for using these spells.

playstyles.title: During diplomacy
playstyles.description: wizards uses reasoning to explain their side, and magic to command respect.

playstyles.title: Against obstacles
playstyles.description: wizards finds creative ways of using their spells, or provides their allies with some magical help.

1.name: Elemental Spray
1.description:
Send a wave of energy from your hand, dealing 4 damage.
Choose the type of energy/damage and the targets' resistance from the following list:
- {Poison}: Resisted by {Fortitude}.
- {Fire}: Resisted by {Dodge}.
- {ArcaneEnergy}: Resisted by {Warding}.

You roll for each target individually.
1.target: All within a 2x2 tile rectangle next to you
1.bonus: Deal an additional 2 damage per bonus.

1.name: Prestidigitation
1.description:
By performing an inconspicuous action like tapping your staff, you magically enhance a character, making them perform unnaturally well.

Provide +2 roll bonus to the action.
1.reaction: The target rolls to do an action
1.target: You or someone within melee range

1.name: Skill Enhancement
1.description:
Gain a level in the following skills, if you do not yet have them:
- {Arcane}.
- One {Intellect} skill that is not {Warding}.
- One {Knowledge} skill.
- {Warding} and one other {Defense} skill.

2.name: Skill Enhancement
2.description:
Gain a level in the following skills:
- {Arcane}.
- One {Intellect} skill that is not {Warding}.
- One {Knowledge} skill.
- Two {Defense} skill.

You may not gain more than one level in a single skill from this.
